MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:50am on Friday, 11 December 2020
